name: Ursa Den
printed_effect:
{ursa} Elestrals get +1 {attack} and +1 {defense}. When a player
Casts an {ursa} Elestral you can Enchant {omni} to this
Ursa Den. You can Disenchant {omni}{omni}{omni}{omni}
from this Ursa Den in order to Special Cast
an {ursa} Elestral from your hand or deck.
effect: {ursa} Elestrals get +1 {attack} and +1 {defense}. When a player Casts an {ursa} Elestral you can Enchant {omni} to this Ursa Den. You can Disenchant {omni}{omni}{omni}{omni} from this Ursa Den in order to Special Cast an {ursa} Elestral from your hand or deck.
